title: Anatomy of the Horse
description:
Full Title : Anatomy of the Horse
Author : Klaus Dieter Budras , W. O. Sack, Sabine RÃƒÂ¶ck, Aaron Horowitz & Rolf Berg
Publisher : Schluetersche
Year Published : September 14, 2010
Edition : 5 Revised edition
Number of Pages : 208 pages
ISBN-10 : 3899930444
ISBN-13 : 978-3899930443

A revised edition of a very successful book. The new edition contains new chapters on the eye, abdomen, female reproduction, ultrasonography and orthopaedics. The atlas is superbly illustrated throughout with colour drawings, photographs, and radiographs providing the reader with detailed information on the structure, function, and clinical application of all equine body systems and their interaction in the live animal. Already acknowledged by students and teachers as an essential resource for learning and revision, this fifth edition will be a valuable reference for veterinary practitioners and for those who own and work with horses.
